00028 void ext_ctrl_relay1_activate(void) {
00029         PORTD |= (1<<RELAY1_BIT);
00030 }
00031 
00032 void ext_ctrl_relay1_deactivate(void) {
00033         PORTD &= ~(1<<RELAY1_BIT);
00034 }

00076 void ext_ctrl_set_io_dir(unsigned char bit, unsigned char dir) {
00077         if (dir == 1)
00078                 DDRA |= (1<<bit);
00079         else
00080                 DDRA &= ~(1<<bit);
00081 }
00082 
00083 void ext_ctrl_set_io(unsigned char bit, unsigned char state) {
00084         if (state == 1)
00085                 PORTA |= (1<<bit);
00086         else
00087                 PORTA &= ~(1<<bit);
00088 }
00089 
00090 unsigned char ext_ctrl_read_io(unsigned char bit) {
00091         if (PINA & (1<<bit))
00092                 return(1);
00093         
00094         return(0);
00095 }
